column1: Data Science and Artificial Intelligence (Conversion Programme) MSc
column3: School of Electronic Engineering and Computer Science
column5: The MSc Data Science and Artificial Intelligence is a conversion master’s designed for motivated students who have a good first degree in a subject other than Computer Science, who wish to develop the knowledge and skills to gain employment in the Data Science and Artificial Intelligence industry.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
